20101210150011.000|20101210150012.000|CCO|KEEPING UP WITH WHO OWNS PRIVATE

20101210150013.429|20101210150014.857|CCO|U.S., AND THAT'S STIRRING YOU

20101210150016.286|20101210150017.714|CCO|OTHER CRIMINALS COULD TAKE 
20101210150017.714|20101210150019.143|CCO|ADVANTAGE OF THE PROBLEM.

20101210150020.571|20101210150022.000|CCO|ON THIS.
20101210150022.000|20101210150024.000|CCO|WHAT MORE DO WE KNOW ABOUT THIS,
20101210150024.000|20101210150026.000|CCO|JEAN?
20101210150026.000|20101210150028.000|CCO|VERY STRANGE?
20101210150028.000|20101210150030.000|CCO|>> Reporter: YEAH, IT'S KIND OF 
20101210150030.000|20101210150032.000|CCO|SURPRISING TO HEAR THAT THERE'S 
20101210150032.000|20101210150034.500|CCO|THIS ISSUE GIVEN WHAT WE GO 
20101210150034.500|20101210150037.000|CCO|THROUGH WITH OUR AUTOMOBILES.
20101210150037.000|20101210150039.500|CCO|A GAP IN RECORD KEEPING MAY MAKE
20101210150039.500|20101210150042.000|CCO|IT EASIER FOR DRUG TRAFFICKERS 
20101210150042.000|20101210150043.429|CCO|AND TERRORISTS TO USE 
20101210150043.429|20101210150044.857|CCO|ILLEGITIMATE AIRCRAFT.
20101210150044.857|20101210150046.286|CCO|THERE ARE ABOUT 357,000 AIRCRAFT
20101210150046.286|20101210150047.714|CCO|IN THE U.S. BUT REGISTRATION 
20101210150047.714|20101210150049.143|CCO|RECORDS FOR ABOUT ONE-THIRD OF 
20101210150049.143|20101210150050.571|CCO|THEM APPEAR TO BE INACCURATE, 
20101210150050.571|20101210150052.000|CCO|OUT OF DATE.
20101210150052.000|20101210150054.500|CCO|WHY IS THIS?
20101210150054.500|20101210150057.000|CCO|BECAUSE UNTIL NOW OWNERS HAVE 
20101210150057.000|20101210150059.500|CCO|ONLY HAD TO REGISTER THEIR 
20101210150059.500|20101210150102.000|CCO|AIRCRAFT ONCE, AT THE TIME OF 
20101210150102.000|20101210150104.000|CCO|PUMP, AND THEY HAVE TO REPORT 
20101210150104.000|20101210150106.000|CCO|CHANGES LIKE A SALE OR SCRAPPING
20101210150106.000|20101210150108.000|CCO|OF AN AIRCRAFT BUT MANY HAVE NOT
20101210150108.000|20101210150110.000|CCO|BEEN DOING IT, AND AS A RESULT 
20101210150110.000|20101210150112.000|CCO|OF THERE ARE A LOT OF BAD 
20101210150112.000|20101210150113.667|CCO|RECORDS, AND NOW THE FAA IS 
20101210150113.667|20101210150115.333|CCO|TAKING CORRECTIVE ACTION.
20101210150115.333|20101210150117.000|CCO|A NEW RULE WILL REQUIRE ALL 
20101210150117.000|20101210150118.667|CCO|CIVIL AIRCRAFT TO BE 
20101210150118.667|20101210150120.333|CCO|RE-REGISTERED OVER THE NEXT 
20101210150120.333|20101210150122.000|CCO|THREE YEARS, AND AFTER THAT, 
20101210150122.000|20101210150123.667|CCO|OWNERS WILL HAVE TO RENEW THEIR 
20101210150123.667|20101210150125.333|CCO|RETCH STRAGS EVERY THREE YEARS, 
20101210150125.333|20101210150127.000|CCO|COMPARABLE TO WHAT WE DO WITH 
20101210150127.000|20101210150128.667|CCO|CARS.
20101210150128.667|20101210150130.333|CCO|OWNERS WHO DON'T COMPLY WILL 
20101210150130.333|20101210150132.000|CCO|HAVE REGISTRATIONS CANCELLED, 
20101210150132.000|20101210150134.500|CCO|AND THE PLANES WILL NOT BE ABLE 
20101210150134.500|20101210150137.000|CCO|TO FLY LEGALLY.
20101210150137.000|20101210150139.500|CCO|>> IT SEEMS TO GO WITHOUT SAYING
20101210150139.500|20101210150142.000|CCO|WHY THE REGISTRATIONS AFFECT 
20101210150142.000|20101210150143.667|CCO|SECURITY.
20101210150143.667|20101210150145.333|CCO|>> Reporter: THERE IS A HUGE 
20101210150145.333|20101210150147.000|CCO|CONCERN ABOUT POSSIBLE THREATS 
20101210150147.000|20101210150148.667|CCO|THEY COULD POSE, AND 
20101210150148.667|20101210150150.333|CCO|REGISTRATION CAN HELP LAW 
20101210150150.333|20101210150152.000|CCO|ENFORCEMENT.
20101210150152.000|20101210150153.667|CCO|WHEN AN AIRCRAFT ENTERS THE 
20101210150153.667|20101210150155.333|CCO|RESTRICTED AIR SPACE HERE IN 
20101210150155.333|20101210150157.000|CCO|WASHINGTON, LAW ENFORCEMENT WILL
20101210150157.000|20101210150158.667|CCO|RUN THE TAIL NUMBER TO GIVE THEM
20101210150158.667|20101210150200.333|CCO|THE OWNER'S NAME AND HELP 
20101210150200.333|20101210150202.000|CCO|DETERMINE WHAT KIND OF THREAT 
20101210150202.000|20101210150203.667|CCO|THEY'RE DEALING WITH.
20101210150203.667|20101210150205.333|CCO|IT'S NOT DEFINITIVE BUT IT 
20101210150205.333|20101210150207.000|CCO|HELPS.
20101210150207.000|20101210150208.667|CCO|IF THE REGISTRATION IS 
20101210150208.667|20101210150210.333|CCO|INACCURATE, IT ISN'T ANY HELP.
20101210150210.333|20101210150212.000|CCO|THIS CHANGE ISN'T GOING TO 
20101210150212.000|20101210150213.667|CCO|TOTALLY CORRECT THE PROBLEM AND 
20101210150213.667|20101210150215.333|CCO|ELIMINATE THE ILLEGAL USE OF 
20101210150215.333|20101210150217.000|CCO|PLANES AND REGISTRATION NUMBERS.
20101210150217.000|20101210150218.667|CCO|AFTER ALL, IT ISN'T DIFFICULT TO
20101210150218.667|20101210150220.333|CCO|CHANGE A TAIL NUMBER ON AN 
20101210150220.333|20101210150222.000|CCO|AIRCRAFT.
20101210150222.000|20101210150223.667|CCO|DRUG TRAFFICKERS DO THAT.
20101210150223.667|20101210150225.333|CCO|THEY PUT LEGITIMATE NUMBERS ON 
20101210150225.333|20101210150227.000|CCO|THEIR PLANES TO THROW LAW 
20101210150227.000|20101210150228.667|CCO|ENFORCEMENT OFF THEIR TRACK.
20101210150228.667|20101210150230.333|CCO|IT STILL IS LIKELY TO HAPPEN BUT
20101210150230.333|20101210150232.000|CCO|MAYBE NOT QUITE SO OFTEN.
